mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT 1 FROM sys_user WHERE id != #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND (email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT msr.role_code AS "roleCode" FROM sys_role msr,sys_role_user msru,sys_user msu WHERE msr.id = msru.role_id AND msu.id = msru.user_id AND (msu.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR msu.mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT mrm.menu_button AS "menuButton" FROM sys_role_menubutton mrm WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys_role msr,sys_role_user msru,sys_user msu WHERE msr.id = msru.role_id AND msu.id = msru.user_id AND msr.role_code = mrm.role_code AND (msu.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR msu.mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (id, username, nickname, password, email, mobile, prefix, org_id, province_regioncode, city_regioncode, status) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{provinceRegionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityRegionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
